news.description: Jamaica's Omar McLeod will miss the Commonwealth games in Australia because 'he did not make himself available', team officials say.
news.title: Commonwealth Games 2018: Omar McLeod 'did not make himself available'

news.description: Another nor'easter threatened a new round of power outages as it swirled ashore early Wednesday.
news.title: Another nor’easter threatening communities along East Coast

news.description: The latest nor’easter bearing down on New England could drop as much as 12 to 14 inches of heavy snow in much of Connecticut, threatening travel and potentially causing more outages while power utilities continue to make repairs following last week’s storm.
news.title: Snow Starts Falling Across Connecticut; Upwards Of 14 Inches Expected

news.description: North Korea’s offer to suspend nuclear and missile tests in exchange for talks with the U.S. reflects an emerging truth about President Donald Trump’s unconventional foreign policy style: It may heighten the risk of conflict, but also the potential for breakt…
news.title: Trump's North Korea Bluster Scores a Win, But at High Risk

news.description: At least one Missouri police officer was killed and two other officers were wounded in a shooting Tuesday night at a home about 75 miles outside Kansas City, authorities said.
news.title: 1 Missouri police officer killed, 2 others wounded in shooting; suspect dead
